description: This table extracts the fax history for the Customer Relationship Management record.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the communication record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FAX_COMM_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the user who sent the fax.

columns.name: FAX_COMM_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the instant of communication for the fax.

columns.name: FAX_COMM_INI
columns.description: This item stores the master file initials of the fax recipient if the fax recipient is an existing master file record.

columns.name: FAX_COMM_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the name of the fax recipient.

columns.name: FAX_COMM_FAX_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the fax number of the fax recipient.

columns.name: FAX_COMM_PHONE_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the phone number of the fax recipient.

columns.name: FAX_COMM_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider who received the fax.

columns.name: FAX_COMM_DEP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department which received the fax.

columns.name: FAX_COMM_LOC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the location which received the fax.

columns.name: FAX_COMM_PHRM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the pharmacy which received the fax.
